articles.description: George Clooney's infamous nipple-enhanced Batman suit from the Batman & Robin (1997) film will be up for auction, with starting bid of $40,000 in July 22.
articles.content:
The notorious bat suit worn by George Clooney in Batman & Robin (1997), which was the fourth and final installment of Warner Bros.'s initial Batman film series, is set to go up for auction.
This… [+4870 chars]

articles.author: Adam S. Levy
articles.title: Drake receives a comment from Jeff Bezos in reference to their beginnings: 'Started from the bottom' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Toronto native captioned the shot, 'Gotta start somewhere' while Bezos, 58, responded with the title of Drake's 2013 hit, 'Started from the bottom.'
articles.content:
Drake on Wednesday received a response to an Instagram post from Amazon founder Jeff Bezos, with the topic being their humble beginnings.
The 35-year-old Canadian superstar posted a pair of images, … [+1991 chars]

articles.description: The Stranger Things creators just launched their new production shingle, Upside Down, with plans for spin-offs, a Death Note TV show, and more
articles.content: Matt and Russ Duffer, creators of Netflixs ongoing sci-fi sensation Stranger Things, are riding high at the moment. After a few years where it felt like their show was steadily falling out of the cul… [+2148 chars]

articles.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore
articles.title: The gang's all back in Clerks III's first trailer - The Verge
articles.description: Clerks II — only in theaters September 13th and 15th — brings Dante, Randal, Jay, and Silent Bob back together in its first nostalgic trailer.
articles.content: Clerks III will only be in theaters for two nights this September

articles.title: The Amsterdam trailer stars everyone from Christian Bale to Taylor Swift - Polygon
articles.description: The Amsterdam trailer showcases a 1930s murder mystery with a massive cast, including Christian Bale, Margot Robbie, Robert De Niro, and Mike Myers. It’s the first film since 2015 from Silver Linings Playbook’s David O. Russell, whose history of controversy i…
articles.content: The first trailer for David O. Russells return to filmmaking features Margot Robbie and John David Washington
